url = #{url} interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT C.name FROM tbl_sac_route A INNER JOIN tbl_sac_bypass B ON A.bypass_id = B.bypass_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_sac_channel C ON B.channel_id = C.channel_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT C.name FROM tbl_sac_route A INNER JOIN tbl_sac_service B ON A.service_id = B.service_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_sac_channel C ON B.channel_id = C.channel_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}

SELECT "bypass" as bypass, C.protocol, C.domain, C.port, B.path FROM tbl_sac_route A INNER JOIN tbl_sac_bypass B ON A.bypass_id = B.bypass_id INNER JOIN tbl_sac_component C ON B.component_id = C.component_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT "service" as service, B.pkg_nm, B.class_nm, B.mtd_nm FROM tbl_sac_route A INNER JOIN tbl_sac_service B ON A.service_id = B.service_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
